Description.Chinese: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants (5k to 100k) and opponents (10k to 200k).
Description.English: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants (5k to 100k) and opponents (10k to 200k).
Description.French: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants (5k to 100k) and opponents (10k to 200k).
Description.German: Erhöht das passive Handelsbudget von den Händlern (5k bis 100k) und KI Mitspielern (10k bis 200k).
Description.Italian: Increases the passive Trade budget from AI merchants (5k to 100k) and opponents (10k to 200k).

KnownIssues.Chinese: Right now, as of game version 9.0, the Budget for AI merchants is bugged, only the first (EarlyGame) value is ever used, so I set it fixed to 50k for now.
KnownIssues.English: Right now, as of game version 9.0, the Budget for AI merchants is bugged, only the first (EarlyGame) value is ever used, so I set it fixed to 50k for now.
KnownIssues.French: Right now, as of game version 9.0, the Budget for AI merchants is bugged, only the first (EarlyGame) value is ever used, so I set it fixed to 50k for now.
KnownIssues.German: Leider ist das Spiel diesbezüglich noch verbuggt (game version 9.0), sodass nur der EarlyGame definierte Wert das ganze Spiel über von Händlern verwendet wird. Daher beträgt dieser Wert, bis das gefixt ist, das ganze Spiel über 50k.
